name: ShowerSimulator
description:
A painfully accurate real life shower simulator.

Drag the water handles to control the water flow

Made for GodotJam2018

There is an interesting particle shader in here, that allows you to change the amount of particles without the particle shader resetting. 

If you are new to Godot and want to learn how to code and organize scenes, don't look a this. Seriouly, it's ugly.
